text:
Company: Grimes-Fuller  
Role: Technical Support Manager Allscripts Professional EHR

Company Overview:  
Grimes-Fuller is a leading healthcare technology company committed to delivering innovative solutions that enhance patient care and streamline clinical workflows. Our mission is to empower healthcare providers with cutting-edge technology and exceptional support.

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description:  
We are seeking an experienced Technical Support Manager for our Allscripts Professional EHR team. The ideal candidate will manage a team of technical support specialists to ensure high-quality customer support and satisfaction. This role involves troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and maintaining strong customer relationships.

Responsibilities:  
- Leading and managing the technical support team to provide exceptional service.
- Overseeing the resolution of technical issues related to Allscripts Professional EHR.
- Collaborating with customers to understand their needs and provide effective solutions.
- Developing and implementing support policies and procedures.
- Monitoring team performance and providing regular feedback.
- Ensuring timely and accurate communication with customers.

Qualifications:  
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
- Minimum of 5 years of experience in technical support, with at least 2 years in a managerial role.
- Strong knowledge of Allscripts Professional EHR.
- Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
- Ability to work well in a team-oriented environment.
- Commitment to creating an inclusive work environment.

Benefits:  
- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Opportunities for professional development and growth.
- A diverse and inclusive company culture.
- Health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Paid time off and flexible work arrangements.

Grimes-Fuller is dedicated to fostering an inclusive culture, valuing the skills of refugees and immigrants, and supporting diversity and inclusion in the workplace.
